channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 21:37 The threat of use of the cope proportion of the use
item.description: 🟠 21:37 The threat of use of the cope proportion of the use This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
